languages.text: {n}Ни единая мышца в лице Маражая не дрогает. Вы видите, как его руки на рукоятках мечей сжимаются еще сильнее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ни единая мышца в лице Маражая не дрогает. Вы видите, как его руки на рукоятках мечей сжимаются еще сильнее.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ни единая мышца в лице Маражая не дрогает. Вы видите, как его руки на рукоятках мечей сжимаются еще сильнее.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Marazhai reste totalement impassible. Tout juste remarquez-vous qu'il raffermit sa prise sur ses épées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Marazhai reste totalement impassible. Tout juste remarquez-vous qu'il raffermit sa prise sur ses épées.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの表情は微動だにしない。あなたは彼が剣の柄を強く握っているのに気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの表情は微動だにしない。あなたは彼が剣の柄を強く握っているのに気づく。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上甚至都没有一丝抽搐，你注意到他握紧了刀柄。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上甚至都没有一丝抽搐，你注意到他握紧了刀柄。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}In Marazhais Gesicht regt sich kein einziger Muskel. Du bemerkst, dass er seine Schwerter fester umklammert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In Marazhais Gesicht regt sich kein einziger Muskel. Du bemerkst, dass er seine Schwerter fester umklammert.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai no mueve ni un solo músculo de su cara. Adviertes que sus manos se cierran con fuerza en torno a las empuñaduras de sus espadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai no mueve ni un solo músculo de su cara. Adviertes que sus manos se cierran con fuerza en torno a las empuñaduras de sus espadas.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde kas oynamıyor. Kılıçlarının kabzasını daha da sıkı kavradığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a muscle twitches in Marazhai's face. You notice him tighten his grip on the handles of his swords.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde tek bir kas bile oynamıyor. Kılıçlarının kabzasını daha da sıkı kavradığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
